description.value:
The Father of Feasts concerns himself with the joy of community. One of the Blessings, Belaunatar's greatest servants are those who mend old feuds and join with their neighbors.

Edicts: Seek to improve yourself and your community, trust those you work with, encourage cooperation.

Anathema: Betray another's trust, place conflict between ideological differences over people's lives.

Areas of Concern: Balance, community, negotiation, twilight.
